text: Hiccup and Toothless BLUR PAST, leaving a wake that leads
(Sequence 0200 - New Berk) To the island village of Berk, festively adorned with fla and banners. Major new additions alter its familiar skyli

This... is Berk. The best kept secret this side of, well, anywhere. Granted, it may not look like much, but this wet heap of rock packs more than a few surprises. ON A CLUSTER OF SHEEP, hiding nervously between buildings shadows of passing dragons race by. The group moves as on receding into a shadowy alley, pushing one sheep out into light. It's suddenly snatched and carried into the air!

Life here is amazing, just not for the faint of heart. See, where most folks enjoy hobbies like whittling or needlepoint, we Berkians prefer a little something we like to call-- WHOOSH, WHOOSH, WHOOSH! A wash of VIBRANT COLORS blurs by DRAGONS BARREL PAST at a dizzying speed. Their RIDERS SWI KICK, and ROLL into one another while they WEAVE neck in between the houses, docks, and revamped structures of Ber

It's like an aerial version of the Monte Carlo race. Spectators ROAR from wooden bleachers, fastened to cliff faces and perched over the sea. FISHLEGS, now 20 and even larger, rides his gronkle, MEAT who carries the sheep in her claws, until... SNOTLOUT, also 20, but every bit as juvenile, and his Monstrous Nightmare, HOOKFANG, steal the sheep from them. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 2.
Oh, I'm sorry, Fishlegs! Did you want that?
Snotlout! That's mine! Snotlout FALLS BACK toward RUFFNUT and TUFFNUT, who lag o their two-headed Zippleback, BARF & BELCH.
Here ya go, babe. With a chivalrous grin, Snotlout tosses the sheep to Ruff She SNATCHES it with a sneer and a GRUMBLE.
Did I tell you that you look amazing today? `Cause you do.
Come on, Barf. It's starting to stink around here. Barf starts to peel off, spewing gas. Tuffnut mocks Snotl with a mugging grin.

Nope. Still hates you. Let's blow this place, Belch! Belch ignites the gas, sparking a flashy explosion, and leaving Snotlout behind in the smoke. As they rush past the main bleachers, Ruffnut DROPS her s into one of five baskets suspended over a chasm at the la crossing. Each backboard bears an image of its correspond dragon. The Barf/Belch basket filled to the brim with she Presiding over the game, STOICK turns to the frenzied cro
That's nine for the Twins, Astrid lags with three, Fishlegs and Snotlout trail with NONE! Stoick eyes an empty basket at the far end, its backboard painted with an image of Toothless.
And Hiccup is... nowhere to be found. Hmmm. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 3.

Scared him off with the big talk, didn't ya, Stoick? WHACK! Snotlout, still smoldering from the blast, gets CLIPPED from behind. ASTRID, rolls in, astride STORMFLY - spirited and competitive as ever, and beautiful despite herself.
What are you doing, Snotlout?! They're going to win now!
She's my princess! Whatever she wants, she gets.
Ruffnut?! Didn't she try to bury you alive?!
Only for a few hours! BACK TO THE RACERS, as they peel away, pouring on the spe

Dragons used to be a bit of a problem here. But that was five years ago. Now they've all moved in. And, really, why wouldn't they? The racers chase each other through a sprawling hangar an into a vast cave, teeming with colorfully painted dragon stables. They exit through the far side and circle back through the village, blasting past many of its dragon- friendly additions.
We have custom stables... all-you- can-eat feeding stations... a full service dragon wash... In the village, a baby Gronkle sneezes, accidentally sett one of the Viking houses aflame.

Even top-of-the-line fire prevention, if I do say so myself. Astrid rolls her eyes, peels away from the other dragon racers, and yanks open a spout on the overhead network of aqueducts, dousing the flames with a surge of water. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 4. BACK TO STOICK, amused as he watches the racers round the island, searching for sheep. He turns to Gobber and nods.
It's time, Gobber.
Righty-ho! (aloud, to the crowd) Last lap! A HORN sounds. The racers all turn to each other, excited
The black sheep! Come on, Stormfly! We can still win this thing!
Come on, Barf!
Let's go!
Go, Meatlug! GOBBER loads the BLACK SHEEP onto a catapult.
This is your big moment. Have a nice flight! He pulls the trigger, LAUNCHING the black sheep into the Astrid spots it and steers Stormfly into a steep climb to it.
Up, up, up! In a flash, Fishlegs and Meatlug blur past, NABBING the sheep.
No!
Good job, Meatlug! Fishlegs tosses his captured prize to Ruffnut.
Here you go, darling. Mine's worth ten! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 5.
Yeah! The Black Sheep! Snotlout sighs, frustrated.
You guys are fighting for Ruffnut?!
I'm totally winning! Fishlegs hovers up nest to Ruffnut with a starry-eyed smi
We're winning together! She RAMS BARF into Meatlug, sending Fishlegs into an uncontrolled SPIN. He SLAMS into Snotlout, sending their dragons TUMBLING head over tail. The crowd goes wild.
No one can stop me now!
Except for me. We're attached, genius! He GRABS at the sheep. Ruffnut fights back, inciting a tu war.
Quit trying to steal all my glory! And while they're distracted, Astrid steers Stormfly towa them, CLOSING IN.
Get `em, Astrid!
It's MY glory! No sheep, no You're always ruining glory! EVERYTHING! Astrid leaps off of Stormfly, runs up Belch's spindly nec and PLUCKS the black sheep from the Twins' hands.
Gotcha! She tumbles through the air onto Stormfly, sticking a per landing, black sheep in hand.
Astrid! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 6. BACK TO STOICK, beside himself. The crowd ROARS.
Well played! Hahaha! (gloating, to the crowd) That's my future daughter-in-law!

eyeing the fast-approaching FINISH LINE, unaware as... FISHLEGS suddenly RAMS Meatlug into Stormfly, sending Ast off-course. She recovers and sees Snotlout flying headlon toward her, war hammer cocked, aiming at Astrid.
Uh, excuse me.

Stormfly! Snotlout HURLS his hammer. Astrid ducks and rolls Stormfl out of the way. The hammer catches Fishlegs in the face w a CLANG. The crowd collectively winces. Astrid and Stormfly recover from their roll, loop over th water, and they BLAST past the finish line, DUNKING the b sheep into their basket!
That's thirteen! Astrid takes the game! The crowd COMES UNHINGED. Astrid flies over the crowd, basking in her victory.
Yep. Berk is pretty much perfect. All of my hard work has paid off. And it's a good thing, too, because with Vikings on the backs of dragons, the world just got a whole lot bigger.

(Scene 0300 - AWOL Part One) A boundless sky. Vast. Clear. Crisp. And from it, a BLACK SPECK rockets across the horizon. The image of unbridled freedom. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 7. Tucked into his riding position, HICCUP appears to be par TOOTHLESS. They dip, roll and dive, over a sea teeming wi Thunderdrums, pulling off daring maneuvers with honed refinement, making them seem effortless.

Yeah! They jackknife, heading skyward, rolling and tumbling thr the ethereal cloud-scapes and joining high-flying Timberj as they soar in formation. Hiccup is bound head-to-toe in a snug, aerodynamic flight suit -- an asymmetrical, functional design of leather and articulated plates. It has an air of Viking bike leather.
What do you think, bud? Wanna give this another shot? Toothless grumbles in protest.
Toothless! It'll be fine. With a click of a lever, he LOCKS the pedals in the flare tail position. Hiccup then unhooks himself from the saddl

Ready? Toothless SNORTS unenthusiastically. Suddenly, Hiccup SLIDES OFF of Toothless, peeling away fr him like a skydiver from a plane, YELLING as he plummets. Toothless dives after him. They spiral through the air, f to-face. Toothless is having fun, despite himself. Hiccup slips his forearms through a pair of tucked leathe flaps... and YANKS, unfurling SHEETS OF LEATHER as he ext his arms. They catch the wind, SNAPPING OPEN like WINGS.. and sending him GLIDING -- out of control, at first, then stabilizing. The turbulence buffets his flight suit heavi But he's flying! Toothless unfolds his wings, too, catching up with Hiccup The freedom is palpable. Hiccup and Toothless are, for th moment, the same. Feeling the same rush of adrenaline. Independently together. They PLUNGE past cloud formations, splitting apart then crossing paths again. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 8. Impressive as it is, Hiccup is gliding at a steep angle. Toothless launches fireballs ahead of Hiccup, boosting hi higher with the expanding heat bursts.
This is amazing! A cloud layer washes past, exposing a towering ROCK FORMATION, dead ahead.

No longer amazing! Toothless! Hiccup tries to steer himself away, to no avail. Toothless POURS ON THE SPEED, trying to catch Hiccup as h HURTLES toward collision. His locked tail makes maneuveri difficult. He's UNABLE TO PULL UP at a steep enough angle

Oh, no! At the last second, Toothless BLASTS the jagged rocks jus ahead of Hiccup, then WRAPS Hiccup in his wings as they f through it. The obliterated peak rains down around them. Toothless emerges through the cloud of debris and HURTLES into the trees of a neighboring peak. They tumble down th uneven terrain, coming to rest on a small plateau. Hiccup emerges from the cocoon of Toothless' wings. He switches his prosthetic riding foot to his walking foot a stows his leather wings.
That really came out of nowhere. The blown up sea stack collapses.

We gotta work on your solo gliding there, bud. That locked-up tail makes for some pretty sloppy rescue maneuvers, eh? Hiccup reels in his dorsal fin and removes his helmet, revealing a 20 year old Hiccup framed by wild hair, compl with a Viking braid. He walks to the edge of the cliff, taking in the NEW LAND stretching off into the horizon, its tall cliffs and sea- stacks adorned with swaying gold birch trees basking in t dappled afternoon sunlight. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 9.

Looks like we found another one, bud. Toothless FUSSES and SNORTS, not amused, shaking off dust pebbles like a wet dog. Hiccup flinches as a pebble WHACKS him on the back of the head. He looks back to Toothless, who averts his eyes.
Oh, what? Do you want an apology? Is that why you're pouting, big baby boo? Well... try this on! Hiccup TACKLES Toothless and tries to put him in a headlo
Ya feeling it yet? Huh? Picking up on all my heartfelt remorse? Toothless simply stands on his hind legs, lifting Hiccup of his flailing feet and dangling him over the cliff's ed
Oh, come on. You wouldn't hurt a
Hiccup looks down, seeing the precipitous drop below.

You're right! You're right! You win! You win! WHAM! Toothless flips him over, pinning him to the ground Hiccup squirms, throwing mock punches. Toothless playfull retaliates with feline taps to Hiccup's head.

He's down! And it's ugly! Dragons and Vikings, enemies again, locked in combat to the bitter -- URFFF! Toothless rests his head on Hiccup -- SQUEEZING THE AIR o of him. Toothless then suddenly starts grooming Hiccup, lapping at his face and covering him in slobber.
Gaaaaagh! Hiccup fights to get free, finally springing to his feet shaking off the viscous saliva. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 10.

You KNOW that doesn't wash out. Toothless LAUGHS, pleased with himself. Shifting his attention back to the new land stretched out before them, Hiccup reaches beneath his chest plate and produces a leather-bound book. He unfurls it to reveal an EXPLORERS MAP, modified with a strips in every direction to accommodate their ever-expan world. Drawings indicate new lands, new tribes, and many dragons. Hiccup peels a fresh strip of paper from a hidden fold in flight suit and holds it out for Toothless to lick. Hiccup affixes the moistened strip to the map's outer edg then whittles a pencil and consults a compass affixed to forearm.
So what should we name it? Toothless GURGLES as he gnaws under his wing, preoccupied
"Itchy Armpit" it is. Hiccup carefully draws the new island's outline.
Whaddya reckon, bud? Think we might find a few Timberjacks in those woods? The odd Whispering Death or two in the rocks? Who knows... maybe we'll finally track down another Night Fury.
Wouldn't that be something?
So, whaddya say? Just keep going? Toothless' ear plates suddenly SHOOT UP. He ROARS, and hi call is answered by a familiar SCREECH. Hiccup turns to see...
(Scene 0325 - AWOL Part Two) ASTRID rising into view, astride Stormfly. Stormfly grabs talon-fulls of rock to slow her landing. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 11.
`Afternoon m'lady. Where have you been? Astrid dismounts and throws back her fur hood as Toothles rushes up to greet them.
Winning races. What else? The real question is... where have YOU been?
Avoiding my dad.
Oh, no. What happened now? Astrid sits beside Hiccup, inspecting his latest addition the map. Behind them, Toothless greets Stormfly, inciting play fight.

Oh, you're gonna love this. I wake up. The sun's shining. Terrible Terrors are singing on the rooftop. I saunter down to breakfast, thinking all is right with the world, and I get... He gets to his feet and puffs out his chest.
... Son, we need to talk. Astrid smiles and adopts Hiccup's sloppy slouch.
Not now, Dad. I've got a whole day of goofing off to get started. Hiccup breaks character, grimacing at her impression of h

Okay, first of all, I don't sound like that. What is this character? And second... what is that thing you're doing with my shoulders? Astrid laughs, jostling her shoulders in an awkward way. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 12.
A truly flattering impersonation. Anyway, he goes... (resuming Stoick's brogue) You're the pride of Berk, son, and I couldn't be prouder...
(continuing her impression
Aw, thanks, Dad. I'm pretty impressed with myself, too.
WHEN have I ever done that with my hands?
You just did. She laughs, playfully.
Okay... just... (holding her arms, mock-
Hold still. It's very serious. She giggles, trying to hold a straight face.
(resuming Stoick's brogue) You're all grown up, and since no chief could ask for a better successor, I've decided-- Astrid straightens, her face brightening.
--TO MAKE YOU CHIEF! Oh, my gods! She jumps to her feet, beaming...
Hiccup, that's amazing! And socks Hiccup in congratulations, deliberately hitting dorsal fin release button and triggering it to pop up. Sh laughs as Hiccup reels it back in, self-consciously.
You're gonna wear out the spring coil. The calibration is very sensitive! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 13. They're suddenly BOWLED OVER by Toothless and Stormfly.
Yeah, so... this is what I'm dealing with. Astrid helps him up and dusts him off.
What did you tell him?
I didn't. By the time he turned around, I was gone. Astrid picks up the map, folding it as she paces around h processing it all.

Well, it's a lot of responsibility. The map will have to wait for sure, and I'll need to fly Toothless, since you'll be too busy... She pauses, wincing in sympathy. She turns to Hiccup. He knowingly, taking the map from her.
It's not me, Astrid. All those speeches, and planning, and running the village... that's his thing.
I think you're missing the point. I mean, chief. What an honor. I'd be pretty excited. Hiccup shakes his head.
I'm not like you. You know exactly who you are. You always have. But... He shuffles to the cliff's edge, gazing out at the new la

I'm still looking. I know that I'm not my father... and I never met my mother... so, what does that make me? HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 14. He sits at the edge, looking burdened, restless. Astrid approaches and settles beside him, joining him in looking at the distant horizon. She weaves another braid into his hair as she speaks.
What you're searching for... isn't out there, Hiccup. She places a hand on his chest.
It's in here.
Maybe you just don't see it yet. She kisses his cheek, but gets a mouthful of Toothless' slobber. She grimaces, wiping it off. Distracted, Hiccup eyes the horizon keenly.
Maybe. But, y'know... there is something out there.
Hiccup... He turns her face to the horizon. A distant smoke plume r from a misty valley.

(Scene 0400 - Shot Down!) Hiccup and Toothless fly over the fjord, winding deep thr undulating crimson and gold forests. Astrid and Stormfly catch up as the autumn colors suddenl give way to charred timbers. They fly deeper, through ash wafting smoke. Ahead, in a sheltered harbor, an explosion ice stands as an eerie marker of what used to be a TRAPPE FORT.
Stay close. They fly through the suspended remains of the buildings, splintered, and frozen in mid-destruction.

What happened here? HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 15. It's at once harrowing and puzzling. Toothless spots an enormous DRAGON FOOTPRINT in the muddy shoreline below, leaving him uneasy.
Easy, bud. As they crest the ice formations, Astrid spots a CREW OF at the stern of a moored ship below.
Hiccup!
Fire! The men fire a stern-mounted cannon. The projectile unfur into a NET. Hiccup and Toothless dart out of its way.
Astrid! Look out! It HITS Stormfly, TANGLING her wings and causing her to s uncontrolled. Astrid struggles to free her as they HURTLE toward a collision.

Astrid falls off of Stormfly, but Toothless SNATCHES her the last second. Stormfly hits the ground, tangled in the net. Trappers ru out of hiding, piling onto her with ropes and weapons. Sh whips her tail, sending spikes flying.
Watch the tail! A large, raven-haired trapper lunges over the spray of sp and lands upon Stormfly's head, twisting it and taking he down like a rodeo cowboy.

Tie those legs up! Eret deftly ties her gnashing jaws shut, wrangling her in submission -- clearly a pro among pros. He looks up, revealing a handsome face and gleaming, intelligent eyes search the sky as Toothless' tell-tale BANSHEE scream rin out.
Is that what I think it is? HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 16. Toothless suddenly streaks across the sky, banking and landing with a FEROCIOUS ROAR.

(to the trappers) What are you doing? Astrid and Hiccup leap off of Toothless, rushing toward Stormfly. Eret's men immediately draw weapons. Hiccup extends and ignites his DRAGON BLADE -- a telescoping fiery sword -- impressive enough to wow Eret's men.
Back again? Eret steps forward, focused only on Toothless.

Soil my britches... that is a Night Fury. Thought they were all gone for good. (to his fellow trappers) Looks like our luck's had a turn for the better, lads! Don't think Drago has one of those in his dragon army. His men sound out in agreement. Hiccup eyes Astrid, confu
Dragon army?
Look, we don't want any trouble.
Ha! You should've thought of that before you stole all of our dragons and blasted our fort to bits!
Wait...
What are you talking about? Astrid and Hiccup take in the icy destruction, putting it together. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 17.
You think we did this?
Dragon trapping is hard enough work as it is, without do-gooder dragon riders sneaking in to rescue them.
What do-gooder -- there are other dragon riders?
You mean, other than your thieving friend from last night? You tell me. Eret approaches. Toothless snarls, protectively.
You may have an ice-spitting dragon on your side, but we still have a quota to fill. How do you suppose we explain this mess to Drago Bludvist?
Drago what-fist? Does anything you say make sense?
He's expecting a new shipment of dragons for his army by tomorrow.
And Drago don't take well to excuses. Eret parts his tunic, revealing a large branding-iron sca his torso, in the shape of a dragon skull, split by a swo
This is what he gave me last time I showed up empty-handed. He promised to be far less understanding in the future.
Look, we don't know anything about a dragon thief, or an ice-spitting dragon, or your lunatic boss and his dragon army, okay?
HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 18.
Just give us back our dragon, and we'll go, strange, hostile person whom we've never met. Eret bows playfully.
Oh, where are my manners? I'm Eret. Son of Eret. Finest dragon trapper alive. He pulls a dagger from behind his back, waving it cockily His men ready their weapons and net cannons.
After all, it's not just anyone who can capture a Night Fury. Toothless ROARS a warning.
And this is Toothless. He says we're going. Now.
Heh. They all say that.

Eret lunges toward them. Toothless BLASTS, bringing down massive spire of ice. It shatters as it hits the ground, forcing Eret and his men to dive out of the way. Making quick use of the distraction, Hiccup re-ignites hi dragon blade and slashes through the ropes binding Stormf
Stormfly! C'mon, go! Go! Eret gets to his feet in time to see Toothless and Stormf take to the air, carrying Hiccup and Astrid out of reach the volley of arrows.

head_text.subj: YOU WILL NEVER HOLD ON TO THOSE

text: (Sequence 0500 - Lock-Down!) HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 19. The GANG joyrides past GOTHI'S house, scattering her assortment of terrible terrors. She waves a fist at them they sweep past, WHOOPING AND CHORTLING, leading us down to... THE UPPER PLAZA, where a GATHERED CROWD of Vikings and th dragons are cued up outside of Gobber's BLACKSMITH STALL, awaiting their turns. Stoick maneuvers through the crowd, spouting JOVIAL GREETINGS in passing. He makes a bee-line for GOBBER, who is busily grinding a metal dragon tooth into shape. A Zippleback waits patient his head cocked open like a car hood while the other head watches, sympathetically.
Any sign of him? Gobber flips up his welding guard, revealing a matching a of unsoiled skin.
Ah, he's probably flown off the edge of the world by now. You sure you want that kid running the village? You can still delay your retirement.
Oh, he's ready. You'll see. A SUDDEN EXCITEMENT in the crowd heralds Hiccup and Astri return. They touch down on Toothless and Stormfly.
Haha! There he is! (to Gobber, proving his
Huh? The pride of Berk! Hiccup stows his helmet and heads toward Stoick with urge
Who finally decided to show up for work. Yay.
Sorry. Got held up. (privately, to Stoick) Hey, Dad, could I have a word?
Something you're itching to tell me? HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 20.
Not quite the itch you're thinking of, but yes. Stoick hands him an apron and guides him to the front des
Good man! Now, lesson one. A chief's first duty is to his people. So... Stoick changes the rune on the "being served" placard.
Forty one? Forty --
Could we just talk in private for--
--That's me! That's me! I'm next! (pushing his way through) I was ahead of you! Excuse me, I've been here all day! STARKARD reaches the counter, giddy with excitement.
Okay, I want one of those high seaters, with lots of spikes and a big stowage compartment.
Absolutely! You got it, sir! Stoick spins Hiccup around, steering him back into the sh
Dad, this is actually a little more important than building saddles.
Ah-ah! Lesson two. No task is too small when it comes to serving your people. Excuse us, Grump. They step over the tail of a large, snoring oaf of a drag stirring him awake with a fussy start.

Grump! You let the forge die down again! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 21. Grump coughs a slug of molten lava into the forge. It splatters everywhere, igniting a rash of fires. Hiccup si steps them as he gathers materials in the back of the sta Gobber pulls the fire extinguisher, dumping water everywh
That's it, Grump. You're going up for adoption! Stoick fills a toolbox with tools from Hiccup's workbench
One of these. And this...
-- There you go! Go on. Have away.
But, seriously, I really need to tell you about this new land we came across.
Another one?! Fishlegs walks in, followed by the Twins and Snotlout.
Any new dragons? Stoick slaps a sheet of leather onto a dragon mold, and h Hiccup pencil. Exasperated, Hiccup begins tracing an outl as he speaks.
We didn't stick around to find out. These folks weren't particularly friendly.
Oh, really? Your Night Fury and Deadly Nadder didn't bring them cheering to the rooftops? Gobber spins his prosthetic arm dispenser.
No, this was different. Not the standard run-for-the-hills hoo-ha I've come to enjoy. These guys were trappers. Dragon trappers. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 22.
You should've seen their fort. All blown apart and stuck in giant spikes of ice. It was weird.
I've never seen anything like it. And worst of all, they thought we did it! Gobber pops off his prosthetic tongs and selects a wire b from his dispenser...

Y'know, you two are gonna get yourselves in SERIOUS trouble one of these days. Not everyone appreciates this way of life. Which he uses to brush his mustache and eyebrows. Stoick takes the sheet of leather to the table saw...
Gobber's right, son. Best we keep to our own. Besides, you'll have more important uses for your time -- And pulls a lever, starting it up.
(sing-songy, under his
Once we make the big announcement! Hiccup pulls the lever, shutting the saw down.
They are building a dragon army. Silence fills the stall. Vikings exchange worried glances
Or at least the guy they work for is. Dargo Bloody Fist or something. Stoick's eyes widen. He turns to Gobber, with growing ala
I'll bloody his fist with my face if he tries to take my dragon!
Or mine. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 23.
You're such a moron.
A beautiful moron.
Yeah... Ruffnut grumbles, revolted by their advances. Stoick grabs Hiccup by the shoulders, wide-eyed and inten
Bludvist? Drago Bludvist?
Uh, yeah. Wait. You know him?
Stoick rushes down a circular stone staircase into the va bustling cave that houses the dragon stables.
What? Why?! Hiccup, Astrid, Gobber, and Toothless chase after Stoick.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. Wait! What is happening?
You heard the man! Lock it down! Behind him, the massive storm doors rattle as they're lowered.
No DRAGON or VIKING sets foot off this island until I give the word! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 24.
Because some guy you knew is stirring up trouble in some faraway land? Stoick turns to Hiccup, gravely serious.
Because Drago Bludvist is a madman. Without conscience or mercy. And if he's built a dragon army... gods help us all. Stoick continues on shouting orders, leaving Hiccup stewi
Get them into their pens! Quickly! Hiccup chases around to confront Stoick.
Then let's ride back out there. We'll follow those trappers to Drago and talk some sense into him.
No. We fortify the island.
It's our duty to keep the peace!
Peace is over, Hiccup. I must prepare you for war.
War? Dad, if Drago's coming for our dragons, we can't wait around for him to get here. Let's go find him and change his mind.
Some minds won't be changed, Hiccup. Berk is what you need to worry about.
A chief protects his own. Stoick heads off, calling out more orders...
HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 25. ... leaving Hiccup eyeing Toothless as the storm doors cl Astrid approaches him, seeing the determination on his fa
Hiccup, don't.
I have to. He gives her a quick peck on the cheek.
Hiccup and Toothless BLAST PAST, heading for the exit.
They try to fly through one door, but it seals shut.
Come on! Toothless spins around and DIVES through the gap in the second lowering storm door.
Hiccup! Astrid and Stormfly blow past Stoick and slip through the storm door before it shuts, leaving Stoick fuming.

(Scene 0700 - Eret's Lesson) Eret's ship carves a defiant path North, leaving the last glimpses of Lapland in its wake. Eret stands on the bowsprit, eyeing the waves intently, searching the surface. He turns toward the deck, where hi crewmen man the gunwale cannons, sights trained to the sk

Keep your eyes peeled, lads! With this wind, we'll reach Drago by daybreak, so best we fill this ship up with dragons and quick! It's no time to be picky. Not if we want to keep our -- HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 26.
Uh... Eret? Eret turns in the direction Ug is pointing to see a pair dragons flapping toward them.
The crewmen swing the net cannons toward the back-lit, silhouetted dragons, drawing ever closer.
Net `em, lads! Take `em down! Eret loads a cannon and takes aim. He spots Hiccup and As riding the dragons. His eyes narrow, determined.
You're not getting away this time. Nets fly through the air. Hiccup and Astrid outmaneuver t and dive toward the ship, landing on the deck with a clat
And here I was worried we might turn up empty-handed. Astrid brandishes her axe in invitation. Hiccup indicates her to lower it, then holds up his hands in surrender.
Nope. It's your lucky day. We give up. Eret's crew exchange confused stares. As does Astrid.
That's one Night Fury, one Deadly Nadder, and... He dismounts Toothless and tosses a net over Astrid.

... two of the finest dragon riders west of Luk Tuk. That oughtta make the boss happy, right? Astrid grumbles. He takes her axe, hands it to Eret, and escorts Astrid past the men to the open live well.
Excuse us. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 27. He leads Astrid down the ladder. She glares at him, plain hating the plan.
What are you doing? Toothless tries to follow them, but Hiccup holds him back
Toothless, stay. Hiccup flips the latch, lowering the grate as Eret watche confounded.
The dragons don't really care for cramped spaces, so they'll just hang out with you. They won't be any trouble. Eret's men nervously direct their swords and spears towar Toothless. HE SNARLS.
Unless you do that. Wooden boat, big ocean. How's your swimming?
Not good. A burst of flame erupts from the live well, causing the crewmen to jump back. Hiccup thrusts his Dragon Blade thr the grate.
Oops. Almost forgot. Can't have armed prisoners!
How is this a plan? He retracts the blade and offers it up. A crewman cautiou takes it, looking it over. The pommel of the hilt is expelling green gas.

Just what every dragon trapper needs. One end coats the blade in Monstrous Nightmare saliva. The other sprays Hideous Zippleback gas. All it takes is a spark and... A curious crewman clicks the lighter, igniting the gas. Hiccup ducks as the sudden explosion sweeps over the deck HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 28.
Oh, yeah, there you go! Toothless paws at the embers.
Once they see you as one of their own, even the testiest dragons can be trained, right, bud? Toothless gurgles and falls over.
Give me that! Eret snatches the dragon blade and HURLS it overboard. Stormfly bolts after it...
What game are you playing?

No game. We just want to meet Drago. And returns in a flash, dropping it at Eret's feet like a fetching dog, tongue wagging. Eret throws it again, frustrated. Stormfly returns with it just as quickly.
Why?
Because I'm going to change his mind about dragons. Eret and his crew LAUGH. Astrid pokes out of the well.
He can be really persuasive. Hiccup pets Toothless, thoughtfully.
Once you've earned his loyalty, there is nothing a dragon won't do for you.
Puh! You won't be changing any minds around here. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 29.
I can change yours. Right here. Right now. Hiccup sets Toothless' tail in the locked, splayed positi Eret sneers, suspicious.
May I? Suddenly, Hiccup is snatched into the air! Dragons blur p
(Scene 1000 - Botched Rescue) The crewmen SCRAMBLE to the NET CANNONS as a FLURRY OF WI streak past, GASHING holes in the sails and SLICING throu rigging.
Dragon riders! Toothless SHRIEKS and bounds up the mast, spotting Hiccup the talons of a Monstrous Nightmare. Toothless relaxes, realizing that it's Hookfang.
Put me down! Snotlout! What are you doing? Snotlout looks back to see if Ruffnut witnessed the save.
See how well I protect and provide? Ruffnut GRUMBLES at the incessant courting. A FLYING NET whizzes past her head.
Aggh! What is with all the nets?!
Hey watch it! That was close... Ruffnut spots Eret, FIRING nets from the deck of the ship
A SLOW MOTION, sexy POV of Eret's glistening biceps, shuddering as he BLASTS the net cannon, aimed directly at her. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 30.
Oh, my. The net unravels in SLOW MOTION...
Me likey. ... enveloping Ruffnut as she yields to it, blissfully.
Take me.
As Hiccup FLIPS upside-down in the Hookfang's talons and KICKS off, pulling his wing-suit flaps. Eret takes aim, but Astrid SHOVES him, throwing off the s
Hiccup glides unsteadily towards the ship and collides wi its sail. He slides down the canvas and drops to the deck Toothless lands behind him.

head_text.subj: WHAT ARE YOU GUYS DOING HERE

text: Gobber and Grump land on the deck, scattering Eret's crew
We're here to RESCUE you!
I DON'T NEED to be rescued!
The bow dips heavily as Stoick touches down on SKULLCRUSH He dismounts, fuming. Eret blocks Stoick, cocky and confident.

Well, didn't you just pick the wrong ship, eh? I am Eret, son of -- Stoick shoves his face aside, sending Eret SLAMMING into Grump. Before he can react, Gobber CLUBS Eret on the head sending him collapsing to the deck. Grump then sits on hi smothering him into submission. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 31.
(panting, suffocated) Get... this... thing... off... me! Gobber turns to the other crewmen, with a smile.
Anyone else? Eret's men eye the Vikings, armed and flanked by their dragons. They set down their swords.
That's what I figured.
You. Saddle up. We're going home.
No.
Of all the irresponsible --
-- I'm trying to protect our dragons and stop a war! How is that irresponsible?

head_text.subj: BECAUSE WAR IS WHAT HE WANTS, SON

text: Hiccup glares, frustrated. Stoick SIGHS, realizing that he has to explain.
Years ago, there was a great gathering of chieftains to discuss the dragon scourge we all faced.
A hulking, cloaked figure strides confidently into fire-l hall, interrupting a council meeting of Viking chieftains His face is masked in silhouette. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 32.

Into our midst came a stranger from a strange land, covered in scars and draped in a cloak of dragon skin. He carried no weapon and spoke softly, saying that he, Drago Bludvist, was a man of the people, devoted to freeing mankind from the tyranny of dragons. ON STOICK, some twenty years younger, seated in a throne, studying the impudent stranger with suspicion.
He claimed that he alone could control the dragons and that he alone could keep us safe, if we chose to bow down and follow him. The Viking council erupts in mocking laughter.
Snotlout, Fishlegs, and the Twins snicker.
Stupid.
Good one.
Aye. We laughed, too...

Until he wrapped himself in his cloak and cried out, "Then see how well you do without me!" Drago Bludvist pulls the dragon skin cloak over himself a marches toward the door. Above, dragon fire rips through ceiling, bringing down flaming timbers, followed by drago covered in heavy metallic armor. They BLAST FIRE as panic ensues.
The rooftop suddenly burst into flames, and from it, armored dragons descended, burning the hall to the ground.
HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 33.
I... was to only one to escape. The Twins, Snotlout, and Fishlegs exchange spooked glance
Men who kill without reason cannot be reasoned with.
Maybe. Hiccup turns and stomps toward Toothless, determined. Ere watches intently.
Hiccup...
I'm still going to try. Hiccup jumps onto Toothless and locks eyes with Stoick.
This is what I'm good at. And if I could change your mind... I can change his, too.
Come on. Toothless and Hiccup TAKE TO THE AIR, leaving everyone stirring in awkward silence. Astrid mounts Stormfly, about to go after him.
Let's go.

NO! Lead the others back to Berk. I've had enough mutiny for one day. Astrid stirs, conflicted, as Stoick stomps toward Skullcrusher, fuming. He passes Ruffnut, who's busily fondling Eret's biceps as he lays crushed under Grump.
Ooh, I like that.
Ruffnut! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 34.
Ugh! Okay!

(Scene 1100 - Ambushed!) Hiccup stares ahead, frustrated, as Toothless glides over bed of clouds, glowing in the low, Arctic sun. Hiccup YELLS, then slumps back onto the saddle. Toothless recoils, sensitive to Hiccup's upset. The steam from their breath mixes in the frigid air.

Don't worry, bud. I'm not gonna let anything happen to you. I promise. Toothless' ear plates perk up. He glances over his should to see a disturbance in the blanket of clouds. A strange and arresting MASKED WARRIOR rises from the clo standing upon something unseen. Its armor and cape flap i the buffeting turbulence. The warrior eyes Toothless and Hiccup, pulling up alongsi them. Hiccup senses the approaching figure in his periphe and sits up, flustered.

He whirls around expectantly then FREEZES, mouth agape. The warrior stares blankly, tilting his head in curiosity while cutting a menacing silhouette. Then, just as gradually as he rose, the warrior dips back beneath the clouds, disappearing.
Okay.

No sudden moves. Suddenly, the warrior EXPLODES out of the clouds before t standing atop a large dragon. They circle Hiccup and Toothless, forcing them to TREAD AIR. The warrior points a staff toward Hiccup, unnervingly, as returns to face them. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 35.
Hold on, hold on. Toothless GROWLS a warning. Suddenly, they're ambushed from behind. Hiccup is plucked of Toothless by another DRAGON and carried off.

Toothless! With the tail unmanned, Toothless PLUMMETS helplessly. He FLAPS wildly then CRASHES through the ice into the black, frigid water. FLAILING and CRYING OUT, he struggles to st afloat as he watches... Hiccup disappear into the night sky, carried off in the talons of the strange dragon -- one of TENS that accompan the warrior in a cavalcade. Toothless BELLOWS in distress, desperately trying to take the air. As he LEAPS and CRASHES, time and again... A group of SPINY DORSAL FINS split the ice, carving a pat toward Toothless. Beneath the ice, a pod of SEASHOCKERS approach, two-heade with Manta Ray like wings GLIDING silently in the gloom. Fixated on Hiccup, Toothless is caught by surprise as the Seashockers surface and DRAG HIM UNDER. Hiccup's helmet bobs to the surface, marking all that remains.
(Scene 1300 - Dragon Lady) Hiccup shivers in the claws of the dragon, surrounded by strange flock full of breeds he's never seen. He looks ba for Toothless, now long gone.

head_text.subj: HE CAN'T FLY ON HIS OWN

text: The warrior offers no response, seemingly immune to the c as he leads the dragon flock across the polar night -- an alien landscape, harsh and foreboding. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 36. Out of the fog looms an EPIC ICE FORMATION -- jagged, spi and similar to the icy aftermath of Eret's fort, but many times its size. The DRAGON ESCORT dives into its jagged folds.

The WILD RIDE suddenly gives way to a MULTILEVEL, CAVERNO CHAMBER made of ice and columns of basalt rock. It's heav populated with dragons of all kinds, looming in the shado Hiccup is dropped in the center. He scrambles to his feet calling out into the darkness.

We have to head back for my dragon! A HISSING dragon CLOSES IN, sniffing, leering, aggressive Hiccup extends and lights his telescoping dragon blade, waving a swirl of fire around himself. The dragon pauses, intrigued, and then watches hypnotically as Hiccup pacifi him with calculated sweeps of the fiery blade. The warrior watches keenly from the shadows. Several aggressive dragons close in behind Hiccup. Hearin their hisses, he quickly stows the blade, replaces a cartridge in its hilt, then flips it around and sprays a perimeter of Zippleback gas around himself. He clicks the lighter, igniting a flash ring. The testy dragons recoil. He then reaches through the smoke, offering his open hand The dragons re-approach, sniffing him with calmed curiosi
... tilting his masked head, curious. He dismounts his dr and approaches Hiccup.
Who are you? The Dragon Thief? Drago Bludvist? The warrior circles Hiccup in silence, taking in his gear his dragon blade, his face.
Do you even understand what I'm saying? HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 37. The warrior whirls and HAMMERS his staff. In response, a large dragon ASCENDS from the depths, carrying...
Toothless! Toothless is dumped on the ground next to Hiccup, sopping wet. Hiccup rushes to him, petting him reassuringly. Toothless coos in relief.

It's okay. I'm glad to see you, too, bud. You really had me worried there. The warrior rattles his staff at a nearby dragon. In response, it and the surrounding dragons produce fireligh from their throats, spotlighting Hiccup and Toothless. The warrior sets down his staff and shield, then approach Hiccup, cautiously and animal-like. Toothless SNARLS and circles Hiccup defensively, but then instantly yields to the stranger's outstretched hand. Wit quick, disarming gesture, the warrior lays Toothless down a state of bliss. Hiccup is astounded. The warrior's hand continues toward Hiccup's face. He recoils, but the warrior persists, finding the faint scar Hiccup's chin, glinting in the firelight. The warrior GASPS and retreats a few steps.
(whispered, shaken) Hiccup?
Could it be? After all these years? How is this possible? The voice is surprisingly female.
Uh, should I... should I know you?
No. You were only a babe... The warrior slowly removes the strange mask, revealing VA 40, beneath. Her eyes meet his, equally wide-eyed and agh
... but a mother never forgets. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 38. Hiccup stammers, tongue-tied, aghast.
Come...
(Sequence 1325 - Searching) Stoick and Gobber search over the frigid waves that lap against the pack ice.
Boar-headed! Just like his mother! She could never stay put either. Gobber glances over at Stoick, who's hunched over, brow furrowed and solemn.
Ah, he's just twenty. And a Viking. I mean, could there be a worse combination? Ha! When I think of how stubborn and senseless YOU were back in the day... well, not much has changed, actually.
You know what he's like. He won't give up, Gobber. And if Hiccup finds Drago, before we find him...

Bah! NOTHING can hurt Hiccup so long as that Night Fury's around. It's a Night Fury! Framed by a hole in the ice, a glistening object bobs on surface below. Stoick squints and CIRCLES BACK, leading Skullcrusher in a DIVE toward it. Stoick SNAGS it out of water. It's Hiccup's helmet. Gobber pulls alongside Stoick, seeing his look of dread. Stoick holds the helmet out for his dragon to SMELL.
Find him, Skullcrusher. Find him. Skullcrusher SNIFFS the helmet like a bloodhound, ROARS, suddenly CHANGES HEADING. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 39.
(Scene 1400 - A New Family) CLOSE ON Hiccup, flustered, winded, chasing VALKA through tightly winding corridors.
Hold on! Wait just a minute! Come back here!
This way. Come.
You can't just say something like that and run off! You're my mother?! I mean, what the -- do you grasp how INSANE it sounds?!
I have questions!
Come. Quickly! Hiccup follows her over the difficult terrain. He tries t clamber over a tall rock, unsuccessfully.
Where have you been all this time? Toothless boosts him over. Hiccup lands on the other side
What've you been doing?! They said you were dead! Everyone thinks you were eaten by... Hiccup trails off as he enters...

... a stadium-sized chamber teeming with ferns, waterfall hot springs and THOUSANDS of new DRAGONS. Hiccup wanders in, basking in the in the amazing sight: a dome of sweating ice capping a geothermal micro climate, filled with dragons of every shape and kind. He spots Valka clinging to a basalt overhang, watching hi HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 40.
This is where you've been for twenty years? She nods from her perch.
You've been rescuing them. She nods again, this time with a smile.
Unbelievable.
You're not upset?

What? No. I don't know. It's a bit much to get my head around, to be frank. It's not every day you find out your mother is some kind of crazy, feral, vigilante dragon lady. Valka chuckles, and using her dragon's wing, lowers herse to the ground like a skilled acrobat.
At least I'm not boring... right?
I suppose there is that... (feeble, trailing off) ... one... specific... thing... Excited dragons rush up to greet Hiccup and Toothless. Hi pets a few, marveling at the vast dragon utopia before hi
Do you like it?
I don't have the words. Toothless SNARLS in annoyance as the curious, smothering dragons SNIFF every part of him.
Can I... ? He's beautiful! She reaches out to stroke Toothless, who PURRS at her tou HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 41.
Incredible. He might very well be the last of his kind. She inspects his talons as Toothless rolls onto his back, nuzzling her.
And look, he's your age! No wonder you get along so well. Hiccup smiles, astounded by Toothless' affection for Valk She checks his teeth. They recede into the gums at her to
And retractable teeth? Ah! How did you manage to--
--I found him in the woods. He was shot down and wounded. She winces and offers a sympathetic nod as she stands to caress a few of her own rescued dragons.

This Snafflefang lost his leg to one of Drago Bludvist's iron traps. This Raincutter had her wing sliced by razor netting. And this poor Hobblegrunt was blinded by a tree snare... then left to die alone and scared. (re: Toothless' tail) And what of this? Did Drago or his trappers do this, too?
Heh. Well, crazy thing is... I'm actually the one who shot him down. She glares, confused.

It's okay though. He got me back. (playfully, to Toothless) Right, bud? You couldn't save all of me, could you? You just had to make it even. So... peg leg! Hiccup rattles his prosthetic leg with a smirk. Valka observes their playful rapport with curiosity. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 42.
What did your father think of your Night Fury friend?
He didn't take it all that well. She mutters in agreement.
But then... he changed. They all did. Pretty soon everyone back home had dragons of their own. She smiles at Toothless, dismissive.
If only it were possible.
No, really, I --
-- Believe me, I tried, as well. But people are not capable of change, Hiccup. Some of us... were just born different.
Dragons sweep from the sky, blowing FIRE, carrying off sh and dried fish. Vikings chase them down, hurling weapons.
Berk was a land of kill or be killed, but I believed peace was possible. A Viking is about to finish off a felled dragon, but Valk chases up to him and tugs at his arm.
Stop! You'll only make it worse! The dragon takes wing, escaping to safety... leaving the Viking warrior glaring at Valka.

It was a very unpopular opinion. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 43. As he rushes off, Valka hears a clatter and whirls around see a DRAGON (Cloudjumper) clawing its way through the ro of a house.
Hiccup!
Cloudjumper enters the house through the hole in the roof sniffing out a baby's cradle in the corner. Valka rushes in, panicked.

One night, a dragon broke into our house, finding you in the cradle. Valka draws a sword quietly, slipping up to the dragon, o to find it huddled protectively over the cradle as BABY HICCUP innocently plays with one of its talons.

I rushed to protect you, but what I saw... was proof of everything I believed. Valka's careful approach causes a floorboard to squeak. Spooked, Cloudjumper whips around to face her, accidental SCRATCHING baby Hiccup's chin. Their eyes meet. Valka lowers her sword, transfixed.
This wasn't a vicious beast, but an intelligent, gentle creature, whose soul reflected my own. Stoick's AXE spins through the air between them, barely missing Cloudjumper and planting into a pillar.

Valka, run! Alarmed, Cloudjumper WHIRLS around at Stoick and BLASTS! Stoick DIVES out of the way as the FIRE SPLATTERS against wall, burning a hole and setting the room ablaze. The dragon moves toward Stoick, but Valka grabs hold. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 44.
Don't! It turns to face her again, locking eyes, agitated.
Hold on! Stoick dashes through the fire toward Hiccup and pulls hi out of the cradle. He pulls his axe from the pillar...
No! Stoick! ... but in a WHOOSH of smoke and embers, the dragon and V are GONE.
Stoick! Stoick and baby Hiccup watch helplessly as the dragon spi Valka away into the night sky.
Valka... ON BABY HICCUP'S FACE, with the fresh nick on his chin...
HICCUP'S FACE, with the matching scar.
You and your father nearly died that night, all because I couldn't kill a dragon.
Yeah, it runs in the family.

It broke my heart to stay away, but I believed you'd be safer if I did. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 45. Hiccup considers this, then raises his eyes to hers, seei the sting of remorse.
How did you survive?

Oh, Cloudjumper never meant to harm me. He must've thought I belonged here... She leads him to the edge of raised natural terrace, overlooking the steamy oasis with its flowing hot spring waterfalls. Half-submerged in the warm lake below, a mass white dragon with pronounced, mammoth-like tusks rests benevolently on the banks, his stately countenance like t of a lion surrounded by his pride.
In the home of the great Bewilderbeast. The alpha species. One of very few that still exist.
Every nest has its queen, but this is king of all dragons. Dragons land and bow reverentially to the Bewilderbeast. Valka gestures to the spiked ice ceiling that acts as a sweating greenhouse.
With his icy breath, this graceful giant built our nest. A safe haven for dragons everywhere. On HICCUP, putting it together.
Wait, that's the ice-spitter? He's responsible for all that destruction?

He protects us. We all live under his care. And his command. They pass an eggshell-littered NURSERY. HATCHLINGS dart o of it, greeting them excitedly and inciting chaos. Toothl is overwhelmed by their manic picking and scratching. Cloudjumper balks and sends them scattering.
All but the babies, of course... HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 46. The hatchlings clamber on top of the Bewilderbeast and pl on his massive tusks, despite his authority. Valka laughs

... who listen to no one. The Bewilderbeast lets out a frosty SNORT, sending off th youngsters to spread more mischief. Now awakened, The Bewilderbeast raises his gargantuan hea take a closer look at Hiccup, coming eye to massive eye. Valka bows in his presence. As does Toothless.

I've lived among them for twenty years, Hiccup, learning their ways, discovering their secrets... He acknowledges Hiccup with another icy snort, slicking b Hiccup's hair in a frosty veneer. Valka laughs.
He likes you.
Wow. She chuckles, delighting in his awe.
You must be hungry.
Uh, yeah. I could eat.
Good. It's feeding time. Toothless tucks himself beneath Cloudjumper's wing, tryin befriend him, but Cloudjumper isn't having any of it. He grimaces and follows Valka out.
(Scene 1200 - Astrid Takes Charge) Astrid and Stormfly circle a lone iceberg, being used as rest stop for the Gang and their dragons. She lands with frown, eyeing the distance.
I don't like it. They should've been back with Hiccup by now. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 47.
I don't like it either. Eret son of Eret was the man of my dreams. My everything!
But, baby, I grew facial hair for you. Fishlegs strokes his peach fuzz beard, meek and dejected.
Me, too.
What if Drago shot them down? What if they need our help?
We have to find them.
What? But Stoick said...
It doesn't matter what he said, if they've all been captured. Come on! She flies off, determined.
Eret's ship is beset by ice floes. The crew stirs on deck he paces, grumbling, while nursing his head with a large chunk of ice.
Do we go back?
We've nowhere to go! Nothing to sell! And no heads to call our own, if we don't turn up with dragons and fast -- He's suddenly scooped up in Stormfly's talons.
Careful what you wish for!
HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 48. Nets whiz past as Astrid and the Gang rocket out of range
What is this?!
A kidnapping. Ruffnut grabs his leg, clutching him possessively.
Yay! Can he ride with me? Can he? Can he? Both Eret and Tuffnut groan in protest.
You're gonna show us the way to Drago.
And help dragon riders sneak into Drago's camp? Just kill me now.
That can be arranged. Stormfly, drop it. In enthusiastic response, Stormfly pops open her talons, sending Eret plummeting. He wails and flails as he hurtle toward the ice far below.
Good girl! Stormfly, fetch. She dives after him, just as enthusiastically. ON ERET, terrified, as the ground rushes up at him.
Stormfly suddenly SNATCHES him out of his free-fall just before hitting the ice. Astrid giggles and cracks her knuckles.
Works every time. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 49.
(Scene 1600 - Momma's Boy)

Hiccup and Toothless follow Valka and Cloudjumper over a majestic fjord in the long rays of the low Arctic sun. Hiccup peers over his shoulder to see that a thick flock dragons -- nearly all of Valka's rescues -- are close on their tail. He turns back to his mother, confused.
Hey, I thought we were going to eat?

(with a mischievous grin) Oh, we are. She directs his gaze below, where in the choppy water of fjord, a group of Seashocker dragons are corralling a den shoal of fish near the surface. Suddenly, the Bewilderbeast rises from deep below, scoopi the fish up in its vast mouth as its tusks break the surf It breaches just below Hiccup and Toothless, giving them fright before spitting the fish into the air and crashing back down into the sea. Valka laughs at Hiccup's surprise as the hungry dragons r for the flailing fish, scooping them out of the air. Hicc gestures to Toothless to join in and he gladly scoops up mouth full.
Hiccup has his map spread out in the snow, explaining the various lands he's discovered during his explorations.

And from Dragon Island, I found this archipelago... He looks up to see that Valka is no longer next to him, b she has sketched out the rest of the northern land masses the snow, wowing Hiccup with just how far and wide she ha explored. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 50. She returned to Hiccup's side with a smile. But his amaze is interrupted by Toothless joining in, drawing all over Valka's map with a giant icicle. Hiccup simply shrugs as his mother giggles, and Cloudjump sneers.

Valka and Hiccup rise on their dragons, carried skyward b strong coastal wind that thrusts vertical up shoreline cl One by one, dragons leap from the cliff and catch the str updraft, popping their wings open like kites. They ride t wind and orbit around each other in a colorful, mesmeric dance. It's clearly a form of dragon play. Hiccup, lifted off of his saddle by the force of the wind laughs giddily as he watches Valka walk across Cloudjumpe wing and onto several others, dragon-hopping from one to another, until she gracefully crosses Toothless from wing to wing tip. She then drops out of sight, reappearing a moment later standing atop Cloudjumper. Hiccup is in utte awe of her. Valka breathes in the frigid air. Lets it out blissfully.
When I'm up here, I don't even feel the cold. I just feel...
Free. She smiles at Hiccup. He gleams back.
This is what it is to be a dragon, Hiccup. Hiccup LOCKS the pedals in the flared tail position and unbuckles himself. Valka watches, curious.
It's all well and good to call yourself a dragon. Hiccup RUNS OFF of Toothless, pulling his stowed wings.

But can you fly? They catch the air, SNAPPING OPEN... and sending him GLID HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 51. Valka GASPS, astonished. She flies her dragon alongside h marvelling, as... ... Hiccup SOARS, riding the wild air currents like an ea the image of freedom. Toothless descends steadily with hi hovering protectively. Hiccup grins, pleased at having impressed Valka... until realizes that he is once again racing toward a collision a fast approaching mountain top.

Oh no. Toothless! But, with his tail locked, Toothless can't make the tight jackknife turn skyward to rescue Hiccup. Realizing that they're in trouble, Valka and Cloudjumper on the speed. All four of them collide just as they reach mountain top, sending them crash-landing in an explosion snow. They all TOPPLE head over tail to a messy landing on the swept ridge and pop up LAUGHING.

Man! Almost! We just about had it that time! Toothless raises his snow-packed face, glowering. He tail swipes Hiccup off of his feet and back into the powder. Valka inspects Hiccup's wing suit with utter fascination.
Incredible.
Well, not bad yourself. She caresses his cheek, staring deep into his eyes. Hiccu doesn't recoil this time.
All this time, you took after me. And where was I?
I'm so sorry, Hiccup. Can we start over? Will you give me another chance? Hiccup smiles, a simple acknowledgement that all is forgi HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 52.

I can teach you all I've learned, these past twenty years. Like... Valka finds a spot at the top of Toothless' neck and rubs a circular pattern. In response, his dorsal blades slowly crack, split and extend, forming a pronounced, aerodynami `V' down the length of his back and tail.

Now you can make those tight turns. Toothless shudders, as if experiencing a much-needed chiropractic adjustment. He bounds over to Hiccup, giddil retracting and splaying his dorsal blades like a kid with new toy.
Did YOU know about this? Valka smiles, delighting in their mutual amazement.
Every dragon has its secrets. Toothless pounces around, showing off to Cloudjumper, who seems thoroughly unimpressed.
And I'll show them all to you. We'll unlock every mystery, find every last species, together, as mother and son.
This gift we share, Hiccup... it bonds us. This is who you are, son. Who we are. We will change the world for all dragons! We will make it a better, safer place!
That sounds... amazing. She pulls him into a hug -- forceful, bursting with emoti Hiccup hugs Valka back. They share a cathartic moment, be Hiccup peels away from her.
This is so great! Now you and I can go talk to Drago -- together! She chuckles, incredulous. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 53.
What? There's no talking to Drago.
But we have to --
-- No. We must protect our own. Hiccup stares, exasperated by the familiar line. Cloudjum lumbers over, eager to be rid of Toothless' puppy-like energy. Valka pets him.
Now come on, we should be getting back. Before Hiccup can say anymore, he hear heavy breathing ne to him, and looks over to see Toothless with a gaping gri clapping his dorsal blades.

(Scene 1350 - Meet Drago) Astrid and the gang stealthily approach a cluster of tabu icebergs, collapsed against each other at the mouth of a maze. Stormfly drops Eret to the snow, but before he can flee, she lands atop him and nests like a hen with her eg
Agghh! Okay! I got you here, now get this thing off me!
Never take a toy from a dragon. Don't you know anything? Stormfly crushes him in place under her weight.

Gah! Why does this keep happening to me? Astrid crawls up the rising ridge to reveal... A MASSIVE FLOTILLA, moored together like a floating camp the deep water between collided icebergs. Thick chains run deep into the water, where great blasts bubbles erupt on the surface. The unseen creature rocks t ships. Its effect alone describes it as gargantuan. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 54.
What's down there? Fishlegs rifles through his note cards contained in his b pouch.

Large diameter bubbles, massive lungs, cold water deep dweller, I'm thinking class five leviathan, maybe six. Suddenly, Stormfly is alerted to an encroaching menace an takes wing. BLOW DARTS whiz through the air, hitting the other dragons. The effect is immediate -- they fall to th ground, unconscious. Drugged.

Meatlug! What's wrong, girl? Eret spring to his feet and draws his blades. Astrid and Gang find themselves surrounded by soldiers, camouflaged polar bear furs, and poised to fire darts. They're outnumbered. Fishlegs raises his hands, dropping the card

DRAGO BLUDVIST, a hulking figure draped in a dragon skin cloak, crouches over the prow of the fleet's grisly flags adorned in massive dragon bones and skulls. His scarred f is masked by thick, grizzled dreadlocks.
Drago turns to see Astrid, Eret, and the Gang being forci escorted onto the deck. Eret SHAKES HIMSELF FREE.
Get off me! In the background, a sledge, loaded with Hookfang, Meatlu Belch and Barf -- all unconscious -- is dragged onto the by armored dragons.
Always great to see you, my friend! Keeping warm up here? The soldiers disarm him, pushing him forward as Drago approaches. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 55.

Well, as you can see, I'm right on time with a new batch of dragons, just like I promised. Hookfang awakens, groggily shaking off the effect of the dart. He rears as soldiers struggle to reign him in.
Watch out! He's waking up! Keep him steady!
Give me some backup here!

Drop the ropes. They do so. Hookfang bucks and roars, chasing off the soldiers, then focusing on Drago as he closes in. The arm dragons avert their eyes and cower as Drago passes. Hookfang HISSES a warning, but Drago approaches, undaunte Hookfang BLASTS. In a blur, Drago wraps himself in his dr skin cloak. The sticky, napalm-like fire splatters agains the fireproof scales, enveloping Drago in dripping flames he persists forward without missing a step. As the blast ends, Drago drops the cloak, closing in and holding a cold stare. Hookfang lets out a ferocious ROAR. Drago YELLS back with a fierce, savage scream, interrupti Hookfang and causing him to recoil. Drago whirls his bull hook overhead and STABS it into the deck planks. Hookfang stirs, his aggression fading in the face of Drag unflinching show of dominance. After a moment, Hookfang averts his eyes and lowers his h in submission. Drago places his boot upon Hookfang's snou pressing it into the deck planks.
Hookfang!
Hey!
What are you doing? HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 56.
(quiet, to the dragon) You belong to me now.
And as an added bonus, I also caught you their riders. No extra charge. Drago notices the saddle on Hookfang's back. His eyes wan to the saddle on Meatlug. Alarm flashes in Drago's eyes.
What?! Are you kidding me?!
But you were so perfect!
Turns out, there's a whole bunch of them out there. They -- In a flash, Drago stops toward Eret and seizes him by the throat.
How many? As Eret chokes, stammering, Astrid whispers to the gang.
Drago doesn't have them after all.
Hundreds! A whole island full! His grip tightens around Eret's neck as he turns to Astri
I wouldn't worry about it. My men are hunting them down as we speak. They won't know where you're hiding. I promise you that. Astrid nods a covert signal to the Gang -- she has a plan
Oh, yes they will! Drago drops Eret as Astrid advances, staring Drago down. tries to signal her to stop, but it's no use. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 57.
They know we're missing and they have tracking dragons. If you so much as touch us, Hiccup is gonna
-- Hiccup?
He's not a problem. Really. Trust me.
He's only the son of Stoick the Vast... Drago's eyes narrow upon hearing Stoick's name.
... his heir to the throne of Berk... and the greatest dragon master this world has ever seen!
Dragon master? I ALONE control the dragons!
Nope.
Sorry!
And unless you let us go, right now, he will blast through here on his Night Fury and blow your entire fleet of ships to splinters! Eret slips away, trying to distance himself from the tens
Then they'll be crying like babies!
Funny and beautiful.
Good one, babe! Ruffnut groans, exasperated by their smarmy advances. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 58.
Yeah. Like babies. They always cry. Real tiny ones... Drago grabs Eret by the face and bears down on him.
First there was one rider. And now all of Berk.
And YOU led them to me. He THROWS Eret across the deck.
Drago!

text: Soldiers CHEER in the thousands.

And get rid of him.
Drago, please... The soldiers HURL throwing knives at Eret... But Stormfly lands in a blur of wings, shielding Eret fro the flurry of blades. She whips her tail, throwing spikes all directions.
Stormfly ROARS protectively, hiding Eret within her wings until a well-blown dart sinks into her neck, bringing her down...
Revealing Eret, gawking in shock. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 59.
(Scene 1800 - Family Reunion) Hiccup reattaches his flight suit while standing on a led overlooking the utopian nest, teeming with dragons. Sever babies race in to hassle Toothless as he naps.

Well, bud, we can't wait around for Drago to attack this place. We've gotta find him first. Let's go. Suddenly, a thick hand clamps down over Hiccup's face -- muffling his scream! Toothless whirls around to find STOICK, towering over Hic He calms Toothless with a touch and releases Hiccup.
Easy now.
Are you kidding me? How'd you get in here?
The same way we're getting you out.
We? Gobber appears in the arch of a tunnel.
All clear!
Toothless. Come. They hurry back into the winding corridor.
Dad! There's something you need to know!
Yeah, yeah, tell me on the way.
This isn't an on-the-way kind of update, actually... HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 60.
I've heard ENOUGH, Hiccup.
... more of the earth-shattering development variety.
Yeah, just add it to the pile.

Dad, unlike most surprises I spring on you, this is one you'll like. I promise! You just have to handle it delicately, so... They round a tight bend in the corridor to find Gobber staring blankly at something unseen in the next chamber. shuffles past Stoick and Hiccup, dazed.
Uh, you might want to take this one. Oh, boy. Stoick draws his SWORD, then braves into the chamber ahea

Dad, can you put the sword away... please? Stoick GASPS as if seeing a ghost... and drops his sword a clatter. Valka stands some twenty paces ahead of him, blocking the path. She lets out an audible SHUDDER upon seeing him. He removes his helmet slowly as Hiccup, Gobber, and Tooth appear at Stoick's side.

I know what you're going to say, Stoick. How could I have done this? Stayed away all of these years. And why didn't I come back to you? To our son. Stoick steps towards her, wide-eyed and speechless. Drago emerge from the recesses behind Valka, hissing protective
Well, what sign did I have that you could change, Stoick? That anyone on Berk could?
HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 61.
I pleaded so many times to stop the fighting, to find another answer, but did any of you listen?
This is why I never married.

This and one other reason. Stoick continues to close the gap, mesmerized. With every step, Valka becomes increasingly flustered. She backs int ice wall, with nowhere to go, and Stoick just a few paces away.
I know that I left you to raise Hiccup alone... but I thought he'd be better off without me. And I was wrong, I see that now, but... Stoick gently reaches a hand toward her face.
Oh stop being so stoic, Stoick. Go on... SHOUT, SCREAM, SAY SOMETHING!

You're as beautiful as the day I lost you. His words snuff her retort, rendering her speechless. She softens despite herself, yielding her cheek to his palm. caresses her skin as a reluctant tear runs through his fingers. He PULLS her into a KISS. She resists briefly, t gives in. The surrounding dragons softly RETREAT in kind. Hiccup gapes, warmed by the sight of his parents reunited

(Scene 1750 - Eret's Turn) Drago's massive flagship leads the flotilla, pulled along forcefully by whatever's at the other end of the enormous chain. Drago WHACKS the chain with his bullhook, spurring it forward.
HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 62. Eret, Astrid, and the Gang are escorted to the stern, surrounded by several of Drago's soldiers. Wrists bound. Spear tips pressed into their backs.
Could this day get any worse?
Uh, let me see. You'll jump into freezing cold water and then die from drowning. They reach the gang plank. Eret peers overboard at the de icy water below.
Looks refreshing. He turns to Astrid, meeting her glare with mock chivalry.
Please, ladies first. A pair of soldiers GRAB Astrid by the arms.
You are a steaming heap of dragon --

-- Duck. Eret WHIRLS around, ROUND-HOUSING both soldiers. They GO DOWN, heavily. He catches one of their spears with his bound hands and slices his ropes free. They fall away as he catches the o spear, twirling both in invitation.
Warn the others! One soldier runs to send up the alarm... while the last t raise BLOW DART TUBES. Eret SWIPES the first off of his legs, sending the dart i the neck of the second.

Eret CATCHES the falling tube from the second soldier and BLOWS the dart at the fleeing third. The soldier DROPS, unconscious -- just shy of the Captain's Quarters.
Okay, I love you again. Ruffnut skips past Snotlout on her way to Eret. Snotlout watches, crestfallen.
Ugh. Pathetic. You can still jump. Eret avoids Ruffnut and turns to Astrid.

So? Are we going to save your dragons and get out of here or not? Astrid narrows her eyes, not knowing what to make of him. reclaims his sword and dagger from the unconscious soldie who took them and cuts Tuffnut free.
Check every trap. They're here somewhere.
Astrid slips under a tarp and cranks open a metal trap. S peers between its massive iron teeth, discovering Meatlug within, bound and chained to its base as bait.
Meatlug?
Carefully cranking another trap, wincing at the sound. Th iron jaws of the trap open wider with every CLICK.
Anyone coming? Ruffnut "stands guard," fixated on Eret's rippling biceps

He pauses, then approaches slowly. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 64. Eret carefully reaches out and strokes Stormfly's muzzle.
Thank you for saving my life.
Now let me return the favor.
(Scene 1850 - The Last Dance) As Toothless and Cloudjumper hover for scraps, Stoick and Valka prepare skewers of fish. She's overwhelmed, lost in thoughts, and covering it up poorly.

Mom, you'd never recognize it! Where we used to make weapons, we now build saddles, wing slings -- we even fix dragon teeth! You wouldn't believe how much everything's changed! Valka offers a skittish half-smile and hands him a plate.
Our son's changed Berk for the better. I think we did well with this one, Val.

Thanks, Dad. Stoick places his hands on Valka's shoulders. She flinche dropping the plate. Cloudjumper steals the fish before Toothless can get to i Toothless whimpers, and as a sign of acceptance, Cloudjum regurgitates the fish so Toothless can have some.
I'm... a little out of practice.
Well, y'know... I didn't marry you for your cooking.
(to Hiccup and Grump) I hope not. Her meatballs could kill more beasts than a battle axe.
HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 65.
I've still got a few knocking around in here. Ha ha! Gobber takes a bite, gags, and dump the entire plate of f skewers into Grump's mouth like a trash can.
And once you move back in, with all of your dragons, Drago won't even stand a chance. Everything will be okay! Stoick can see that Valka is overwhelmed. He lays a hand Hiccup's shoulder, calming him.
Slow down, son. It's a lot to take in.

Oh. Gotcha. Valka crosses the room to fill a flask with water, back turned to the group, as Stoick eyes her sympathetically. decides on a different approach... and whistles a familia tune. ON VALKA, as her eyes widen, stirred, recognizing the mel She turns away from Stoick, as the water overflows from t flask.
Oh, I love this one! Stoick approaches her delicately.
Remember our song, Val? Hiccup watches him, curious, as Stoick FUMBLES THROUGH TH FIRST VERSE of an old Viking courting song:

I'll swim and sail on savage seas, with ne'er a fear of drowning. And gladly ride the waves of life, if you will marry me. Valka avoids his gaze, wallowing in a mess of emotions. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 66.
No scorching sun, nor freezing cold
-- will stop me on my journey! (catching himself,
Sorry. Stoick scowls at him, then returns his attention to Valka
If you will promise me your heart... Stoick pauses, setting Valka up for her part of the duet.

And love... Stoick hangs eagerly, awaiting her words, but Valka close her eyes, rejecting his invitation. He lets out a heavy- hearted sigh. But nostalgia gets the better of Valka. She softly SINGS HER PART:

And love me for eternity. Stoick beams. She brushes past him, setting into the cent of the chamber and holding her forearm aloft in invitatio Stoick crosses his forearm against hers, initiating a beautiful dance to accompany the song.

My dearest one, my darling dear, you mighty words astound me. But I've no need of mighty deeds, when I feel your arms around me. The dance is full of charming missteps as Stoick and Valk recreate a moment from their past, before Hiccup's wonder struck eyes.
But I would bring you rings of gold. I'd even sing you poetry.
HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 67.
And I would keep you from all harm, if you'd stay here beside me.

I have no use for rings of gold. I care not for your poetry. I only want your hand to hold. I only want you near me. Gobber can't help himself. He drags Hiccup onto his feet that he can join in the dancing, too.
C'mon, Hiccup!

To love and kiss, to sweetly hold. For the dancing and the dreaming. Through all life's sorrows and delights, I'll keep your love inside me. Hiccup is amazed by the sight of his giddy parents, spinn and laughing in each others' arms, reunited.
I'll swim and sail through savage seas, with ne'er a fear of drowning. And gladly ride the waves of life, if you will marry me! Gobber carries the last note...
I'm still going... Hiccup taps him.
Gobber!
I'm done. Valka and Stoick slow to a stop, WINDED and LAUGHING.
Ah... I thought I'd have to die before we'd have that dance again. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 68.
No need for drastic measures.
For you, my dear... anything. She smiles sweetly. Stoick's eyes well with tears. He goe down on one knee, proposing to her anew.
Will you come home, Val? Will you be my wife once again? Toothless nudges Valka closer to Stoick. They laugh as Hi joins them. Stoick throws his arm around him.
We can be a family! What do you say? Valka, between tears and laughter, turns to Hiccup.
Yes! Gobber pops his head in.
Great! I'll do the cooking! They laugh.
Thank Odin you didn't listen to me, son. We never would have found each other. Suddenly, Toothless and Cloudjumper suddenly perk up, sen something unheard. Hiccup notices.
Toothless? Dragons SWARM past Valka's chamber, racing toward some unknown disturbance.
What's happening? They're answered by subsequent HEAVY BOOMS that reverbera through the fortress. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 69.

(Scene 1900 - Surprise Guests) Valka rushes out to find... DRAGO'S ARMADA in the lagoon below and his forces of thousands now landed upon the beach. They launch catapults and ballistas into the icy spires, gaining entrance into the mountain's tunnels. Hiccup, Stoick, and Gobber catch up to Valka.
Oh, no... Valka tries to hurry off, fuming. Stoick stops her.
Val! It's all right, it's all right. We're a team now.
Now what do you want to do? She glances from Hiccup to Stoick.
We have to save the dragons.
Aye. You got it! He throws an arm around Hiccup.
Come on, son.

VALKA'S DRAGONS SWOOP down to engage the attackers, picki up soldiers and carrying them off while Drago stands in t line of fire, unflinching. The catapults continue to bring down the icy defenses of dragon mountain. Drago's men pour into the tunnels.

Ready the traps! Iron jaws are opened like bear traps, revealing screechin `bait' dragons within. Valka's dragons swoop down to resc them, only to be SNAPPED UP in the fearsome jaws. They're joined by Astrid and the rest of the GANG, bursti out of the traps atop Meatlug and Hookfang. Eret comes flying out last, WAILING aboard Stormfly. He struggles to hold on, as she rejoins Astrid (riding Meatl along with Fishlegs). He gives them a sheepish shrug.
You really are full of surprises. She leaps onto Stormfly, steadying them.
Let's go! Together they rocket across the sky...
Dragon Riders coming through! And DIVE-BOMB the traps, setting them aflame. The yokes a leather bindings restraining the bait dragons are incinerated, freeing them to fly away, unharmed.

SOFT and ROMANTICIZED as her epiphany dawns. Above them, more catapults fire, bringing down massive sp of ice, directly over Astrid and Eret.

Up, girl! To the left, Eret! That's it! Look out! It's about to crush them when... it's BLOWN TO PIECES by Toothless' fireball. Hiccup, Stoick, and Gobber come burs through the flames on their dragons. Hiccup and Toothless arc across the sky triumphantly and their sights on a downed dragon surrounded by soldiers. Toothless BLASTS one of Drago's net launchers, knocking i onto its side. Stoick then CHOPS the trigger line, FIRING catapult and NETTING the throng of soldiers, freeing the dragon. Drago's ARCHERS target Stoick with their arrows.
Take `em down!
Heads up! Gobber flies up from behind, KNOCKING the archers out wit Grump's tail. Gobber chuckles. DRAGO hears Toothless' tell-tale BANSHEE scream and turns see him streaking across the sky.
Dragon Master. Hiccup catches up to Astrid and Eret on Stormfly.
Welcome aboard, dragon rider!
Thanks. I think. Astrid glares, both relieved and annoyed to see Hiccup.
Where have you been?

Oh, y'know. Catching up with Mom. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 72. Astrid shoots him a confused glare. He nods skyward. Astr and Eret look up to see... VALKA, in full warrior garb, rising from the towering ice spikes, atop Cloudjumper.
Whoa... An earth-trembling roar follows as the Bewilderbeast rise behind Valka.
That's your mother?!
Well, now you know where I get my dramatic flair. ON DRAGO, gawking in awe as the great BEWILDERBEAST BLAST an epic explosion of ice upon the attackers.

The alpha! Now we have a fight! Valka blasts overhead on Cloudjumper, commanding swarms o dragons to swoop down and attack Drago's army. Thatta boy! BACK TO VALKA, on Cloudjumper as they pry Drago's armored dragons off of the flailing wild ones. A net suddenly envelops Cloudjumper. They CRASH heavily, but Valka cuts herself free, sliding to a stop just paces away from Drag
I've waited a long time for this! Drago cocks his bull hook, ready to strike, but Valka deflects Drago's hit and attacks him. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 73.
You cannot take our dragons! They are controlled by the alpha!

Then it's a good thing I brought a challenger. He turns to the flagship and YELLS savagely, whirling his bullhook overhead. The heavy chains are released. The underwater creature, n freed, breaks the surface in an epic cascade of seawater. rises toward the shoreline, revealing itself to be... A SECOND BEWILDERBEAST -- bigger, meaner, and covered in scars that indicate years of training and abuse. The chai fall away from iron cuffs fastened to its massive tusks. Valka GASPS.
Another one?
Drago's challenger lumbers onto the beach, focused on Val Bewilderbeast.
No. No.

Come on! Take down the alpha! Valka attacks Drago with her bullhook, trying to stop his commands, but Drago strikes back, knocking her forcefully onto her back. He pins her as she struggles, removing her mask and staff. He's about to finish her off, when WHAM! knocked to the ground. He looks up, fuming, to see Stoick helping Valka to her feet.
Thank you.

For you, my dear... anything. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 74. As Drago gathers his weapon and drops his heavy cloak, circling Stoick, Drago's Bewilderbeast confronts Valka's threat display.
