I'll do my best! Come on, Cloudjumper! Valka cuts the nets away and hops onto Cloudjumper, flyin off toward the Bewilderbeasts as they charge each other, CLASHING TUSKS. Drago LUNGES at Stoick, SWIPING his bullhook.

As Drago hooks and yanks the axe out of Stoick's hands. Gobber flies by and HURLS his mace attachment.

Stoick! Stoick catches it and lands a direct hit on Drago. But, with a devastating SWIPE, DRAGO's Bewilderbeast take down Valka's, plunging in its tusks and burying its opponent's lifeless body under an avalanche.
No! Hiccup and the others watch in horror as dragons everywhe land and bow their heads in acknowledgement of the new al - DRAGO'S ALPHA.
We've won. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 75. Drago points his bullhook toward Valka and Cloudjumper.
Now finish her! Stoick whirls around, spotting Valka and Cloudjumper in t alpha's sights.
No! Drago's Bewilderbeast INHALES... and BLASTS! Valka steers Cloudjumper out of the way, but ice HITS his tail, causin them to SPIRAL out of control toward the icy spires.

Skullcrusher, go! Come on, Gobber! Stoick tosses the mace back to Gobber in passing, who fol brazenly, waving it aloft.

(Scene 2000 - Stoick's Sacrifice) With his tail impaired, Cloudjumper struggles against a throng of oncoming dragons. Valka is knocked off, but man to cling to her dragon's neck. As she loses her grip and FALLS... Stoick LEAPS from Skullcrusher and CATCHES Valka. He sink his axe into an icy column, and they slide to a safe land Drago's Bewilderbeast presses closer, sniffing them out. BACK TO HICCUP, spotting Drago on the battlefield, comman the Bewilderbeast to finish the job.
STOP! Stop! Hiccup lands Toothless a few paces from Drago and brazenl removes his helmet. Drago eyes him, incredulous, then beg to CHUCKLE. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 76.
This... is the great dragon master? The son of Stoick the Vast? What shame he must feel. Toothless snarls, ready to blast, but Hiccup calms him wi hand gesture.
All of this loss, and for what? To become unstoppable? To rule the world? Drago smirks and turns away from Hiccup.
Dragons are kind, amazing creatures that can bring people together.
Or tear them apart. Drago LAUGHS mockingly, then removes his FALSE ARM, revea a stump at his shoulder. Hiccup is taken aback.
You see, I know what it is to live in fear. To see my village burned, my family taken. He reattaches the prosthesis, circling Hiccup menacingly.
But even as a boy, left with nothing, I vowed to rise above the fear of dragons and liberate the people of this world.
Then why a dragon army?
(grinning, smug) Well, you need dragons to conquer other dragons.
Or maybe you need dragons to conquer people.
To control those who follow you... and to get rid of those who won't. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 77.
Clever boy. Drago grabs his bullhook and re-approaches Hiccup. Toothl readies himself.
The world wants peace. And we have the answer, back on Berk. Just let me show you.

NO! Let ME show YOU. Drago SHRIEKS madly, summoning the Bewilderbeast. Toothle circles Hiccup, protectively. ON THE BEWILDERBEAST, about to blast Stoick and Valka. It hears Drago's distant wails, and approaches obediently.
What...? Stoick follows its stare to the distant battlefield below spots Hiccup and Toothless a few paces from Drago.
Hiccup! He rushes off. Valka follows, racing past Gobber as he finally joins them, winded from having run up the mountai
Come on, Gobber!
Okay, change of plans. He hurries back down the mountain after them.
jabbing his bullhook into the ground commandingly. The Bewilderbeast flinches and stops, submissive.

No dragon can resist the alpha's command. So he who controls the alpha, controls them all. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 78. Drago points to Toothless. The Bewilderbeast stares and HISSES, forcing Toothless to cower under a hypnotic ultrasonic broadcast. Toothless struggles against the alp command, writhing and grinding his head against the groun

Toothless? You okay, bud? What's going on? Toothless fights the command, shaking his head in protest The Bewilderbeast insists, with a mesmerizing glare and a low, throaty grumble... until Toothless finally succumbs its control. He raises his head, his stare vacant and robotic, as his pupils turn to slits. Drago then points to Hiccup. The Bewilderbeast responds, HISSING again at Toothless.
Witness true strength. The strength of will over others. In the face of it, you are nothing. Toothless slowly turns to face Hiccup. Advancing.
Uh, what did he just tell you?
Bounding across the ice, pushing himself to make it to Hi in time.

Toothless, what's the matter with you? What're you doing? Hiccup is backed against fallen ice, with Toothless advan mindlessly, and nowhere to run. Toothless opens his yawning mouth. Gas seeps from his thr
Knock it off! Stop! Snap out of it! Stoick barrels through ice formations and over war machin racing against time.
Toothless! No! Toothless! Don't! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 79.
Hiccup!
Hiccup sees Stoick about to run into the fray.

Toothless BLASTS. Stoick leaps in front of it, shoving Hiccup out of the wa and absorbing the blast in the process. He's thrown again the ice with great impact. ON VALKA, hearing the blast, horrified. Drago glances back, seeing Stoick laying lifeless in the aftermath, pleased by the sudden turn of events. He shuff off, satisfied. Stunned, Hiccup comes to and sees Stoick in the rubble. H rushes past the still-entranced Toothless, straining to scatter the ice boulders on top of Stoick's body.
Dad! Valka arrives, winded and aghast.
Stoick... She helps Hiccup to turn Stoick's body over. Valka presse her ear to Stoick's heart, confirming his death with a me glance to Hiccup. He tears up, overwhelmed.

No... you... Gobber, Astrid, Eret, and the Gang arrive, slack-jawed. Satisfied, the Bewilderbeast turns away, releasing Toothl of the trance-like state. Toothless blinks, coming to and confused. He approaches the group, sniffing Stoick's hand Hiccup SHOVES him.
No! Get away from him! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 80. Toothless recoils, innocently.
Toothless retreats like a scolded dog, ear plates back an head hung low. Valka watches, broken-hearted, as Hiccup f upon Stoick, inconsolable.

It's not his fault. You know that. On the battlefield, the alpha BELLOWS, calling all of the dragons to gather. Meatlug, Stormfly, Hookfang and the ot all follow the command as the Gang calls after them.

Good dragons under the control of bad people do bad things. Drago notices Toothless tumble down a snow-bank, once aga slit-eyed and entranced, but unable to fly to the alpha without a rider. Drago pins him down, eyeing the saddle, pedals, and prosthetic tail. ON HICCUP and VALKA In tears as Toothless rises into view, with Drago in the saddle.

head_text.subj: GATHER THE MEN AND MEET AT BERK

text: His soldiers cheer in the thousands.
Toothless! Hiccup tries to go after Toothless, but Valka holds him b
No, don't! Drago JABS his bull hook and points toward the horizon. T alpha BELLOWS, commanding an exodus as it leads the way.
Move out! Hiccup watches, powerless as all dragons TAKE WING and follow. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 81.
(Scene 2100 - Viking Funeral) A KEEL grinds against the shoreline pebbles as a listing, battered ship is pushed into the still iceberg-filled lag

May the Valkyries welcome you, and lead you through Odin's great battlefield. May they sing your name with love and fury, so that we might hear it rise from the heights of Valhalla... and know that you've taken your rightful place at the table of kings. Bows and pitch-dipped arrows are gathered from the battlefield. Gobber hands a set to Hiccup, meeting his ey with sympathetic glance.

For a great man has fallen. A warrior. A chieftain. A father. A friend. Hiccup dips his arrowhead in a smoldering chunk of wrecka igniting the pitch that coats the tip. He releases his arrow, which sails through the air and la on the deck of the ship, where Stoick is laid out on a py covered by a sail, his axe upon his chest. The others follow Hiccup's lead. They DRAW BACK in unison LOOSE their arrows, filling the sky with crisscrossing, flaming streaks. They arc over the lagoon and set the shi alight. ON HICCUP, fighting back emotion and losing the battle.
I'm sorry, Dad. He eyes the engulfed ship.

I'm not the chief that you wanted me to be. And I'm not peacekeeper I thought I was. I don't know... Valka watches him, her heart breaking. She steps forward. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 82.
You came early into this world. You were such a wee thing. So frail, so fragile. I feared you wouldn't make it. Hiccup lowers his eyes, but Valka lifts his chin.
But your father... he never doubted. He always said you'd become the strongest of them all.
And he was right.

You have the heart of a chief and the soul of a dragon. Only you can bring our worlds together. That is who you are, son. Hiccup meets her bolstering stare. He turns to the ship a watches it in silence, silhouetted in its glow.
I was so afraid of becoming my dad. Mostly because I thought I never could. How do you become someone that great? That brave? That selfless?
I guess you can only try. (to the others) A chief protects his own. We're going back.
Uh, with what?
He took all the dragons.
Not all of them.

(Scene 2200 - Hatchlings to the Rescue) WHOOSH! WHOOSH! WHOOSH! JUVENILES BLUR past, like flying raptors, ZIGZAGGING wildly. Riding bareback, Hiccup & Co. HURTLE through the narrow I CHANNELS -- created by massive splits in the iceberg shel HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 83.
Fly straight!
I don't want to die!
We can't fly these things!
Yeah, no kidding! Fishlegs barrels into a snow bank, sending several chunks right into Eret's face as rides inverted and HOLLERING.
But won't that Bewilderbeast just take control of these guys, too?
They're babies. They don't listen to anyone!
Yeah, just like us! Gobber follows up the rear clumsily, STRUGGLING for contr
This... is... very dangerous! He PULLS ALONGSIDE Hiccup and Valka.
Some might suggest this is poorly conceived.

Well, it's a good thing that I never listen. A SHARP RIDGE RUSHES up at them. They're going to CRASH. Hiccup ROUNDS one side of it, and Gobber flies down the o side. They shout through gaps in the iceberg.
So what IS your plan?!
Get Toothless back and kick Drago's- He's interrupted by another closure in the gaps of ice. T blast out of the other side. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 84.
Heads up! They SPLIT to avoid another peak and then reconvene, only find another icy outcropping directly in their path.
And that thing. Gobber HITS it, with a THUD and a YELP.
(Scene 2450 - Hiccup Vs. Toothless) Torches burn in their braziers as Berk slumbers... until Bewilderbeast approaches, STOMPING down on the monolithic Viking statues that guard the harbor.

The sound of destruction rouses a flock of Terrible Terro and Gothi, who was sleeping under the dragons. Their pupi turn to slits, and heeding the ultrasonic call, they fly Gothi shuffles onto her deck, confused, then GASPS at horrifying sight.
A Gronckle lounges peacefully by the fire, as his Viking owner lavishes him with scratches.
Ah, that's a good boy! The Gronckle's eyes suddenly turn to slits and it, too, t wing, knocking over a chair and table as it heads for the door.

Watch the furniture! Where are you going? It barrels out of the hut and into the night sky as the Viking rushes to the doorway, spotting the same arresting sight with a gasp. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 85.

Vikings pour out of the Great Hall as all of Berk's drago fill the night sky and join the ranks of Drago's growing DRAGON ARMY. The Bewilderbeast rises out of the sea, bearing down on t people of Berk as Drago hovers on Toothless, leading the charge. The Vikings stare, aghast.
Your chief is dead. Waves of shock and whispers of "Stoick?" spread through t crowd.
No one can protect you now. He thrusts his bull-hook, commanding the Bewilderbeast to fire. The Vikings watch in horror as the Bewilderbeast op its yawning jaws and BLASTS.

Dragon roars grow louder as Hiccup & Co. approach through clouds, racing against time. They collectively GASP at the sight of Drago's Bewilderbe having now covered most of the village in explosions of i Berk's now commandeered dragons circle in a huddle behind him, joining Valka's flock, and corralled by Drago's armo dragons.
No...
He took all the dragons!
Distract the alpha. Try to keep his focus off of Toothless.
Uh... how?
Have you forgotten who you're riding with? He brazenly aims his baby dragon toward the Bewilderbeast HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 86.
There isn't a dragon alive that I can't wrangle! His baby dragon dives toward the sea instead.
Except for this one!
Amateur. The others shrug and follow. As they get closer, the Bewilderbeast looms bigger and BIGGER. Berk's Vikings in hiding notice Hiccup and the others as approach.
Look, it's Hiccup! The Vikings CHEER. ON DRAGO, surprised to see Hiccup and the others approach

What? With an irate HUFF, the Bewilderbeast focuses on Hiccup, gaining ever closer to Toothless. Suddenly, a SHEEP appears in its sight, rising and fallin out of view. The Bewilderbeast blinks, confused. It looks down to see Eret catching the falling sheep and reloading it into the game launcher, as Tuffnut cocks the mechanism and Ruffnut pulls the trigger.
Keep `em coming! Snotlout tosses the black sheep to Tuffnut.

Black sheep, baby! Exasperated, the alpha inhales, about to blast, when... H The game horn blares, breaking his concentration. He turns, finding the horn unmanned. The Bewilderbeast th returns his focus to the sheep launcher, until the BLACK SHEEP LANDS on the his face, bouncing down his facial spi and becoming lodged. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 87.
Ten points! The Bewilderbeast shakes the black sheep off and prepares blast again.

Uh-oh... HONK! The alpha whips around -- still no one at the horn. ON FISHLEGS, giggling and hiding behind the game horn. The Bewilderbeast finally lets loose the ice blast, cover the entire horn in jagged spikes... as Fishlegs leaps fro the platform.
I'm okay!
as he reaches Drago, hovering directly in Toothless' sigh
You certainly are hard to get rid of. I'll say that. Hiccup ignored him and focuses on Toothless' slitted pupi
Toothless? It's me, bud. It's me. I'm right here. Come back to me. TOOTHLESS' POV: Hiccup appears as an unfamiliar red blur, still firmly under the control of the Bewilderbeast.
He is not yours anymore. He belongs to the alpha! Drago smugly sits back in the saddle, his arms open in invitation.

But, please, oh great dragon master, try to take him. He will not miss a second time. Hiccup holds strong, maintaining eye contact with Toothle He reaches out to touch him. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 88.
It wasn't your fault, bud. They made you do it. Drago's amusement fades as Toothless stirs. His pupils DILATE, then NARROW again.
You'd never hurt him.
You'd never hurt me. Drago watches, amazed, as Toothless fights the control.
How are you doing that? Hiccup holds the stare, tears in his eyes.
Please. You are my best friend, bud. Bewilderbeast ROARS a forceful command.
My best friend. Toothless' pupils jitter, then DILATE fully. He coos sympathetically.

Thatta boy! That's it! I'm here! Toothless' eyes finally dilate fully and resolve on Hiccu familiar face. Drago goes from astounded to alarmed. Drago STRIKES Tooth with the bull hook in a vain attempt to regain control.
No! Toothless ROARS defiantly, snatches the bull hook in his jaws, and PULLS... yanking Drago off of his back and send him both PLUMMETING to the sea.
Yeah! But without a rider, Toothless drops out of the sky as we Hiccup leaps from the baby dragon, diving after him. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 89.
Hang on! Drago breaks his fall, landing heavily upon the Bewilderbeast's tusk... As Hiccup tucks in his arms, trying to close the gap betw he and Toothless before they both make impact with the oc
Almost there, buddy. Almost there! Hiccup reaches Toothless. They pair up, mid-air, and skyrocket past Drago as he hobbles to the top of the alph head.
(Scene 2500 - One True Alpha) Hiccup looks back at Drago, now issuing commands from the of the Bewilderbeast's head.
Do something!

We need to get those two apart. Hiccup flies Toothless past a flag pole tears a strip of flag. The Bewilderbeast BLASTS in their direction, barely missi them as they disappear around the back of a mountain.
We gotta block him out, Toothless. Do you trust me, bud? Toothless coos, allowing Hiccup to BLINDFOLD him with the flag. Hiccup calms him with a touch.
We can do this. You and me. As one. Hiccup SPLAYS Toothless' mechanical tail. Toothless respo MATCHING the move with the natural half.

That's it. Now let's try this one more time! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 90. They PEEL around the other side of the mountain, heading back toward Drago and Bewilderbeast, passing Astrid and t cheering Vikings on the ground.
Take them down, babe! The Viking roar in support as Hiccup and Toothless race p Valka watches with pride as her son hurtles towards Drago the alpha.
Go get `em.
Take control of it! The Bewilderbeast's HISS becomes a furious ROAR, but to n avail. Hiccup clamps his hands over Toothless' ear plates muffling the alpha's commands.
Shut it out, Toothless!
The Bewilderbeast BLASTS!

Toothless suddenly PULLS UP, ARCING over Drago's head! Dr LAUGHS, victorious, then pauses in shock. DRAGO'S POV: as Toothless climbs inverted through the sky the blindfold falls free, revealing an EMPTY SADDLE. Drago WHIRLS around, wide-eyed, to see... HICCUP ZOOMING TOWARD HIM, his wing-suit deployed, and hi Dragon Blade trailing Zippleback gas. Drago SWIPES but mi him. Hiccup clicks the lighter and ignites the gas, blast Drago off his Bewilderbeast with a SCREAM. Drago PLUMMETS, BREAKING HIS FALL against the massive dragon's spines and landing hard on the ground, his bullh landing just out of reach. The Bewilderbeast WHIPS its tail, trying to SWAT down Hic HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 91.
Not again.
Toothless pops open his dorsal blades, arcs skyward, and rejoins Hiccup just before colliding with the alpha's tai
Come on, bud! Together again, they speed along the length of the thrash tail...
Hold on! And shoot past the tip of the tail, narrowly making it!

Yeah! We did it! They arc through the sky and LAND a few paces from Drago, kicking up a trail of dust. Battered and weary, Drago reaches for his bullhook. Hiccu extends and fires up his Dragon Blade, hurling it like a javelin, and sticking it in the ground between Drago and weapon, singeing his outstretched hand.
Agghh!
Hold him there Toothless! Toothless SNARLS a warning, ready to blast.
It's all over now. But the cloud of dust settles, revealing the Bewilderbeas rising behind Hiccup, ready to blast him instead.
Or is it? Hiccup spins around, alarmed, as a RUSH of water THUNDERS the Bewilderbeast's throat.

Oh, no! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 92. It BLASTS, but Toothless leaps into the way, shielding Hi beneath him. The freezing explosion envelops them both. Drago laughs to himself as Valka lands her baby dragon an rushes to the icy explosion, hammering away at it desperately.

No! No... ON ASTRID and GOBBER, watching from a distance, horrified Valka POUNDS at the ice, a GLOWS forms from deep within. realizes what is about to happen and backs away. A BLAST thunders from inside the ice, SHATTERING it. Toothless emerges from the debris, revealing Hiccup curle safely under his wings. Toothless is steaming, his black skin glowing blue with r his split dorsal blades searing with blue heat, a glow emanating from his flared nostrils. He turns back to Hiccup, to check if he's unharmed, then turns his full attention back to the Bewilderbeast. He le out of the crater and lands upon an ice spire, roaring ferociously. The Bewilderbeast bellows back at this affront. Toothless unleashes a salvo of plasma into the Bewilderbeast's face not letting up.
He's challenging the alpha!

To protect you. The Bewilderbeast ROARS at this act of insubordination. Toothless fires back, time and again, fully in control. The alpha thrashes his tusks through the ice, trying to s Toothless, but he deftly spring from spire to spire, continuing his unrelenting attack. In the midst of the mayhem, the horde of commandeered dra -- both Berk's and Valka's -- break free from the control witness Toothless' retaliation. Toothless lands protectively by Hiccup and Valka, command the dragons to shift sides. The follow, amassing behind Toothless. Seeing this, Drago panics and rushes toward the Bewilderbeast. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 93.
No, no, no, no! Fight back! Fight!
Drago clambers up the Bewilderbeast's tusk, totally unhin
(to the defecting dragons) What's the matter with you? The Berkians swell in to show their unified support. Drag fumes as Hiccup and Toothless fly up together onto an ice spire.
Now do you get it? This is what it is to earn a dragon's loyalty.
Let this end now.

Never! Come on! He hammers the Bewilderbeast, spurring it into a charge. Toothless calls over his shoulder, commanding the dragons ready themselves. He then BLASTS the Bewilderbeast, mid- charge. Suddenly, Skullcrusher fires. Followed by another and another. Hiccup looks around, amazed to see the flock of dragons opening fire on Drago and his Bewilderbeast. They've star a rebellion. Drago is forced to hide from the fiery barrage by taking cover in the tall spines of the giant's crown.

His prosthetic arm is blasted clean off by one of his own armored dragons. The Bewilderbeast rears back to cover them all in ice, bu Toothless lets loose a powerful shot. The Bewilderbeast's head is KNOCKED backward by a blue-flame fireball. As the smoke clears, one of its massive TUSKS FALLS to th ground, sheared clean off. Drago glares at Toothless. Toothless ROARS commandingly, calling an end to the fight

The alpha protects them all. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 94. Overwhelmed and overpowered, the Bewilderbeast yields to new alpha and heeds Toothless' command, retreating into t sea in an explosive splash. The Berkians CHEER in victory! As the smoke clears, Hiccup and Toothless see nothing but bubbles on the waves to mark their disappearance. No sign the Bewilderbeast... or Drago. Toothless hops down from the spire, cooling off, as peopl celebrate all around them. All of the dragons -- Berk's, Valka's, even Drago's -- la around Toothless. Cloudjumper bows to Toothless, starting wave of bows, acknowledging their new alpha. Toothless looks around, surprised, then lets out a majest ROAR. The assembled dragons join in, roaring in tribute. Toothless turns to Hiccup as he approaches.
You never cease to amaze me, bud. Thank you. Toothless GURGLES and licks Hiccup's face. Hiccups squeal trying to get away.
Toothless! You know that doesn't wash out. The crowd laughs. All around them, Berk's dragons reunite with their Vikings.
Stormfly! Stormfly bounds into Astrid.
Oh, give me a cuddle, Grumpy! Grump lands ON TOP of Gobber, flattening him. Relieved to the point of tears, Snotlout and Fishlegs rac towards the expectant Ruffnut...
Who's my little princess? ... and then right PAST her to embrace their dragons. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 95.
I missed you so much!
Don't you ever leave again, Hookfang! Ruffnut GRUMBLES, dejected. Barf dips his head in to cons her.
Oh Barf! She hugs him. Belch looms in for some affection, but Ruff pushes him away...
Not you. And into Tuffnut who glowers back at her. Hiccup smiles, taking in the happy reunions. Skullcrusher approaches him, without an owner to reunite with. Hiccup him, as Eret approaches.
That was some pretty fine dragon wrangling back there. You'd make a good trapper. Before Hiccup can respond, Skullcrusher nuzzles Eret affectionately. Eret chuckles and gently strokes him.
Y'know, Skullcrusher's gonna need somebody to look after him now.
Me? Hiccup nods reassuringly. Eret looks at Skullcrusher, pau to consider it.
I'd be honored. Valka walks up to her son, bursting with pride.
Your father... he'd be every bit as proud as I am. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 96.
Thank you. I'm really glad you're here, Mom.
And here I'll stay. Toothless arrives, purring at Valka's touch as Astrid str toward Hiccup, beaming proudly.
See? I told you it was in here. She places her hand upon his chest, then quickly pokes th dorsal fin button, popping it open. She GIGGLES.
Ha, ha. Still doing that one? That's hilarious.
Come here, you. He scoops Astrid close and pulls her into a kiss. Gobber covers a gawking boy's eyes.

Ooh. Gothi, the elder, taps Hiccup's shoulder, interrupting th romantic moment. She gestures for Hiccup to kneel. He doe so, respectfully. Using ash from a heap of burnt wreckage, Gothi traces a Viking symbol onto Hiccup's forehead. She bows. Hiccup stands, meeting Gobber's proud, smiling eyes. Gobb turns to the silent crowd and throws up his arms.

The chief has come home! The Berkians erupt with cheers and applause as Hiccup tak in the moment, acknowledging the weight of responsibility upon him. Toothless throws back his head and BLASTS in celebration, spurring all other dragons to follow suit, lighting up th sky in a spectacular display.

(Scene 2700 - A New Beginning) HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 97. A sheep grazes lazily on the grass as a Terrible Terror struggles in vain to carry him off. Suddenly, both are snatched up by a passing dragon.
Ruffnut and Tuffnut wrestle over the sheep atop Barf & Be Ruffnut send the sheep flying toward Fishlegs. Snotlout n it instead, blowing a kiss mockingly.

This... is Berk. A bit trampled and busted and covered in ice, but it's home. It's our home. They swoop past a gathered crowd on the battered bleacher Snotlout dunks the sheep in his basket. Eret joins the ra atop Skullcrusher. They fly past Hiccup and Toothless, who are steadily hois a palette of timber and supplies onto a rooftop where wor are rebuilding the damaged houses. Hiccup then turns his attention to a massive statue of Stoick, presently under construction. He grins with pride

Those who attacked us are relentless and crazy. But those who stopped them? Oh, even more so! He looks to the horizon, scanning it from east to west to ensure that no trouble is approaching. Astrid and Stormfly buzz past him playfully, coaxing him join the game. He smiles.

We may be small in numbers, but we stand for something bigger than anything the world can pit against us. Astrid soars past the blacksmith stall, waving to Valka a Gobber as they remove the armor from Drago's freed battle dragons.

We are the voice of peace. And bit by bit, we will change this world. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 98. Realizing that he's late, Gobber hurries over to the shee launcher and pulls the trigger, sending the black sheep hurtling into the air. Astrid and Stormfly close in on the black sheep, about to snatch it out of the air, when suddenly, Hiccup and Tooth dart past, beating them to it. Toothless looks back with gummy smile.

You see, we have something they don't. Oh sure, they have armies and they have armadas... Toothless and Hiccup dive toward the line of baskets. As approach, Toothless bounces Hiccup into the air, allowing to dunk the black sheep into Astrid's basket. They reunit the other side. The crowd cheers!
But we... we have... Hiccup and Toothless land upon the chief's dais, joined b Astrid, Stormfly, and the other dragon riders.
Toothless lets out a proud roar as Hiccup look out over B gleaming with pride.
